comments.body:
I'm not sure what the point is to assigning a class with only static methods to an instance variable.

(For that matter, it is not clear to me why this is a class at all, but that seems less confusing)

We do this for consistency and organization. Our modules load FMGRCommon the same way. It's easier for module authors to have them wrapped up in a variable. I've left this one in. Let me know if you have any other feedback on this.
